title: A Corporate Underling Who Excels at Work
summary:
Chae Gyeong-jun, who gave up both college and his dreams due to the IMF crisis, once again faces despair in front of his grandmother's sudden hospitalization fees.

But then, a mysterious benefactor steps in to cover the hospital costs for his family...

"Who would provide support that doesn't help them at all, and why?"

In search of an answer, Gyeong-jun heads to Taeseong.

title: Cry, Even Better If You Beg
Even If Despair Consumes You
summary:
Staying alive is a new form of entertainment.
When Dokyung, disillusioned by the harshness of life, finally resolves to call it quits, a bored demon, Hwamyung, appears before her with a particular offer. Will Dokyung, having entered into a contract with the Demon of Disillusionment, be able to flip her disastrous life upside down?

title: The Man Who Wears Magnolia
summary:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.

title: Sorang’s Flower Art Shop
summary:
1. KAZAMI YU×ARI ver  
Yuuka decides to pay a "surprise night visit" to Alice, and sneaks into her house with the help of Wriggle.  
  
2. KAZAMI Aki Sisters Ver.  
The Aki sister fall victim of Yuuka’s flower shop scam, and have to enlist help for a rather aggressive response.  
  
3. KAZAMI MADMAX ver.  
Yuuka the berserker pays a friendly visit to her dear Alice's café. No really, it's a friendly visit, I swear, don't get troubled by the army of goons tagging along. Or the guns. Or the trenches they dug overnight.  
  
4. KAZAMI FULL METAL JACKET. ver.

title: I Raised an Obsessive Servant
summary:
After being reborn as a desolate fire witch and villain destined to die a tragic death, Chersinia creates a plan to avoid her fate by gambling at a casino to become a wealthy recluse. 

The only problem? She somehow ends up with a slave boy named Ben instead of the money she needs! 

But much to her surprise, she starts to warm up to Ben, who provides the perfect joy and comfort in her lonely life. Little does she know that Ben has a dark secret that will change her life forever...

title: Becoming the Obsessive Male Lead’s Ex-Wife
summary: A struggling part-timer suddenly collapses at work and wakes up in the famous novel "Pervin and Stella" as the villainess Irwyne Liliath. To make matters worse, Irwyne's fate in the story is grim as she's condemned to execution for attempting to poison Pervin, the male lead and a highly respected duke. Desperate to survive, Irwyne is determined to win Pervin's heart. But as she grows closer to him, his feelings evolve in unexpected ways. Irwyne now faces an uncertain fate that wasn't written in the novel's pages. Will she be able to rewrite her destiny?

title: They Live in the Princess’ Flower Garden
summary:
In this new life Ibelia just wanted to be loved but she was born with the talent of a master of spirits, thanks to the seal of the king of spirits. She receives unconditional love from her parents and siblings, and is constantly chased by knights who want to be her guards. Furthermore, she also attracts the attention of several powerful men, who have ambitious plans for her. 

One of them is Ashrath, the king of demons and the only dragon in the other world, who wants to make her his bride. Another is Lelian, her childhood friend and the future emperor, who promises to build her an empire. And there are still others who hide their secrets and intentions. Ibelia will have to deal with them all, while walking along the flower path of an irresistible girl.

title: I wasn’t the only one who returned to the past
When Arrogance Fell at My Feet
Grand Duke, I Can’t Do It Because It’s Too Cold in The North
Virus King
summary: When the apocalypse descends, the world transforms into a brutal game of evolution—humanity’s final trial, and the favorite playground of gods and demons. Brian Carter time-travels back to ten days before it all begins. Armed with foreknowledge and no time to waste, he injects himself with the zombie virus and awakens a legendary SSS ability: Virus Monarch! Now, with the power to command infection itself, Brian forges a terrifying new path through the chaos, one where he doesn’t just survive the end of the world, but rules it!

title: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury
summary: Exploited by her brother, betrayed by her sister, and killed by her husband. So ended the tragic story of Ariana Lopez--until, at the moment of her death, she suddenly finds herself back in the past. Now that she has a chance to do it all over again, she enlists the help of Duke Dante Heigenberg, the most feared and desired man in the entire empire, to take revenge against her family and reclaim what’s rightfully hers. But strangely, the duke seems to want Ariana more than just for her extraordinary musical talent...

title: The Password Is 002
summary: Sujung finally makes up her mind to confess her feelings for Dojin, her classmate who she's had a crush on for 6 months. However, Dojin is unable to recognize Sujung on the street and passes by her. Shocked by this, Sujung is unable to go to class and runs off to the gym's storage. There, she meets Jaehyun, who promises to help Sujung and Dojin get closer... How? By making a grand scheme to seduce her crush with his younger brother!

title: Fighting Ward
summary:
A high school student, Kang Sun-woo, single-handedly defeats a group of illegal loan sharks who came to his house. At the hospital, where he goes for treatment, he is invited by a mysterious man to participate in a suspicious fighting tournament with a huge cash prize.

The prize is crucial for the survival of his family. Sun-woo must survive the fight ward !

title: Today I Demand Quality of Death From You With All Due Respect
The Cute Little Saintess
summary:
My mom is the naive and sweet protagonist in a tragic romance novel. My mom is also the substitute lover who escaped from the overbearing President. And I? Well, I'm the five-year-old genius hacker.

Gu Chu, a brilliant hacker, finds herself reborn in a tragic romance novel as a five-year-old cutie. Her mother is the unfortunate heroine, her father is the blind-to-reality President, and they're surrounded by scheming relatives, a two-faced aunt, and various villainous women.

Determined to protect her mother, little Gu Chu stands tall and begins to fight back. What harm could a five-year-old possibly cause? She just wants to protect her mommy and maybe inherit her President daddy's billions along the way.

title: Everyone’s Darling
summary:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?

title: The Villainess’s Coffee Story
summary:
Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger.

"Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."

title: Logging 10,000 Years into the Future
summary: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!

title: I wish to annul the engagement
summary:
Collection of Mihara Mitsukazu's one-shots (2005):

- Ch. 1 - Slice of Black Chocolate (2001) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/wz4adqj?utm_source=mangadex)
> "Generally… a story about really cute guy trying to hook up with this really egotistic girl… although it's not really like that."

- Ch. 2 - The Vampire & I (2001) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/9023ktd?utm_source=mangadex)
> "A dark european ambient and the story of a vampire … just before dinner time."

- Ch. 3 - Children Can't Choose Their Parents (2000) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/eua0juz?utm_source=mangadex)
> "A haunting story about a man and his chicken. You will never look at an egg the same way again after reading this story!"

- Ch. 4 - Cut the Angel with a Scythe (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/7xes9iy?utm_source=mangadex)
> "Angela is suffering from a terrible illness that keeps her confined… One day a magician comes to her window to visit… Will his magic change her fate?"

- Ch. 5 - The End in Common Ruin (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/jmm0fja?utm_source=mangadex)
> "A story about two twins…"

- Ch. 6 - Deserted Place (2002) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/al2hlpo?utm_source=mangadex)
> "The story follows the journey of a mysterious boy who brings peace to deserted places and things…"

- Ch. 7 - Alice in Underground (2003) - [MU](https://www.mangaupdates.com/series/9kq7bop?utm_source=mangadex)
> "This short oneshot tells the adventures of Alice, but with a slightly darker tone."

title: Sweet Whispers
summary:
Oneshot promoting the first volume of the Light Novel "Alya, Who Sits Next to Me, Sometimes Whispers Sweet Nothings in Russian". Popularity may result in a serialization!  
  
Follow the story of the ice-cold perfect beauty, the half-Russian Alisa "Alya" Mikhailovna Kujo, and your average high school underachiever, Masachika Kuze. She has a cold exterior, but speaks her love in a language she thinks nobody understands… Little does she know that he understands her just fine! Enjoy the silly slice-of-life romance between Snow Princess and Mr. Worldwide!

title: Ancestor is beautiful and elegant
summary: Bai Chuwei waited for five thousand years before entering the original plot, debuting as the ancestor of all humanity. Wealth? The largest assets in the world she has. The eight aristocratic families? All just her servants. As everyone is worshiping their ancestor, Bai Chuwei, the fourth young master of the Duan family in Haicheng, held her in his arms. What the heck! Bai Chuwei was just trying to absorb the spiritual energy from this guy, whom she witnessed growing up. She didn’t expect to lose her heart

title: What A Disgrace
summary:
In the back of the forest lives Allen, the people-hating wizard. He is feared by the people around him and called the "Demon Lord". One day, while living out his life as a hermit, he finds a young girl named Charlotte who collapsed. Although innocent, she was accused of evil wrongdoings, had her engagement broken and was forced to flee her country.

Upon hearing that, Allen recalled the bitter experience of being betrayed by a party he once believed to be his companions. Hearing the story of the 17 year old’s exploitation, Allen decides, “I'll let her live in my mansion, and I'll teach her all sorts of bad things…"

title: The Life Goal Is to Get a Two-Story House
summary:
'No one will love me!'
"No one will ever trust me."

Frequent business failures on her father's part had pushed Jia into a life of hardship, and her boyfriend of six years cheating on her had brought her to the brink of despair.

"If there's a next life..."

She thought it was the end. But then...

"Maerin, are you awake? Are you feeling better now?"

Jia reincarnates as a refugee girl named "Maerin," who has crossed from the war-torn country of Helayton to Perrington. Will the new life as Maerin give Jia a chance to become wealthy and fulfill her dream of having her own home in this lifetime?

title: Your Highness i Decide My Fate
summary: Betrayed by her family and sentenced to die as an experiment, Phillie Lutner awakens the Tarot Cards of Fate, a Divine Relic with the power to rewrite time. Determined to reclaim her life, she uses their magic to escape her former fiancé, outsmart her scheming half-sister, and claim her rightful place as heir to the House of Lutner. But as she uncovers a dark plot surrounding the Relics, one question remains - can she break free from the past and build a future with those she loves, or is she doomed to repeat her tragic fate?

title: Onsaemiro
summary:
To prepare for her audition to cast in the upcoming historical drama, “Muyoung Tower,” would-be actress Haeri visits the Buyeo National Museum, where she finds the “gilt bronze incense burner,” an old Baekje artifact. Thanks to her, Onsaemiro, the son of a god who had been lying dormant in the incense burner, awakens, and the cycle of fate starts to move once again…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5083255), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=745472)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/xiangluqiyuan/list?title_no=1527)
* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=2086)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/onsaemiro/list?title_no=3232)

title: It’s My Life – Webtoon
summary:
"This time, I'll protect my happy family for sure!"

Takhir, a young baron who had lost his beloved family, was unable to do anything and thus labeled as an incompetent. However, as he was dying, his time-space magic suddenly manifested and he regained the memories of his previous life before being transported back to his childhood?! He no longer faltered in the face of war or the epidemic. He vowed to use his revived modern knowledge to improve their level of civilization... and to change his family's fate!

By using his knowledge of the future, he was determined to reduce the damage caused by the poor harvest and flood, while doing everything he could to get talented individuals on his side, strengthening the Solis barony! By moving without concerning himself with the gaze of others, he would go beyond the Kair Kingdom, altering history across the entire continent! With his "family-first principle", the child prodigy would alter his depressing fate!

title: What Kind of Rice Cake Is This
summary: One day, Gong Siru, who was losing interest in college life, had a pleasant campus life with the appearance of Seol Gibaek, a returning student. Shocked by Kibaek's ideal type, Siru takes her anger out with a drink and kisses someone present while drinking... A jumbled campus love story between Gong Siru who has a crush on Seol Kibaek, and Jo Chung, who becomes strangely connected to Gong Siru.

title: Back to Chanbi
summary: Gyeono Kang, a lucky high schooler, used to enjoy the mutual love he shared with the prettiest girl in his class, Chanbi Baek. She was always all about him until an accident wiped her memories of the past year, and just like that, she no longer had feelings for him. But what about Gyeono, whose heart still beats for her? Is it even possible to win her back? Did she really like him back to begin with?! Somebody help!

title: I Become the Tiger’s Daughter
summary:
Elcan, a dark magician, is fired from his party due to his lack of talent with offensive magic.  As he wandered the streets he came across twins, who were abandoned by their parents.

"I couldn't be a good dark magician, but I want to make their lives better!"

He decided to retire from being an adventurer and raise these two girls as his own. And so, he raised his daughters, Corona and Selena. Teaching them black magic and enrolling them in a prestigious magician's academy. After learning more about magic, the girls return to see their father with some important news... They are S-rank Sages?! And they want to form a party with him?!

title: To Julie
summary: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.

title: Possible to Date a Ranker?
summary:
Collections, in no particular order, of super short comics posted by author Hamita on Twitter/X and pixiv. The short story collections mainly include romcom and boy meets girl, but also include various genres such as scifi, gag, and suspense.

## Volume 1
1. An Imperfect Woman
2. Different Kind Of Different Kind
3. My Girlfriend Isn't Cute
4. Image Frequency
5. A Salesman Who Sells Greed
6. Maid Makeshift
7. A Goddess Without Inconvenience
8. One-Night-Only Passingman
9. Overhumankind's Planet

## Volume 2
10. Persistent Sports Girl
11. Misdelivered Love Letter
12. The Person Who Filled My Heart
13. A Beauty Soft And Fluffy In All Directions
14. The Apathetic Maid's Mismanagement
15. A Cold Senior And Warm Junior
16. The Ideal Cool Girl Who Is Only Kind To Herself
17. Duplicity And A Laughingstock
18. Robot And Landscape Painting

## Volume 3
19. The Soft-Spoken Conveni Clerk
20. A Girl Who Grasped A Secret
21. A Girlfriend Who Wants To Make Meals
22. I Want To Quit Being A Demon
23. A Bad Girl's Bag Inspection
24. Otherworldly Civilization
25. I Like Beauties Even With Bad Personalities
26. Counselor
27. The Transfer Student Ranked First In The Year
28. A Literature Girl Who's Kind To Geeks But Strict Only With Me

title: Oh, the Flower That Bloomed on the Wall
Don’t Pay Attention to The Villainess
The Hated Noble Lady, Yet in a Contract Marriage with the First Prince?!
summary: No summary available.

title: The Villainess Licks the Ice Prince Clean
Battle of Mosol
summary: Win love! Win 500 million won! A competition begins where three single women in their thirties put 500 million won on the line to break free from being single. A princess without her prince, Gong Jurim, a trash collector, Kang Seon, and a firm believer in premarital purity, Kim Chaeyul! Who will be the ultimate winner of this singles showdown?

title: The Extra Guardian Missed the Right Time to Leave
summary:
I was supposed to have died in an accident… but when I opened my eyes, I found myself inside the pages of my favorite novel!
And the worst part? I wasn’t reborn as the heroine or even the villainess… but as a completely insignificant side character.

According to the original story, the noble couple I work for will soon disappear, and all the servants will be dismissed afterward.
I knew exactly how it was going to play out, so I told myself:
“I’ll just live quietly, freely, and comfortably in my own way.”

But things didn’t go as planned…

Suddenly, and completely against the original plot, I find myself in charge of the marquess’s children, who were left behind after the tragic accident.
I’ve become their guardian, even though I was never meant to play this role!

Even when I tried to walk away, I couldn’t ignore their innocent eyes and their need for comfort…
So I chose to take on the responsibility, leading them on a journey filled with surprises and challenges.

title: Dangerous Office Romance
summary:
Raised by conservative educator parents, Jisoo could never dream of straying far from their high moral standards. 
However, there was that one time when she had a passionate one-night stand with a cute stranger she met while clubbing with her friends.
To her great surprise, she runs into him five years later as her company's newly appointed CEO!

title: Happiness of the the Holy Maiden’s Fresh Start
It’s Not The First Time
summary:
Third-year high school student Makoto Koga decides to confess to his crush, the school's most beautiful girl, second-year Saki Meguro. To his surprise, she agrees to date him. But what surprises him even more is her following words: "I'm not a virgin."

Unbeknownst to Koga, the surprisingly passive Meguro has the reputation of being the lascivious "easy girl" at school, not rejecting any boy that approaches her and having gone through multiple boyfriends. Will Koga persevere? Will he fare any differently than the rest? How will Meguro react to Koga, a boy who, for once, actually approached her before he knew of her reputation?

*Note: Was originally on Palcy (Kodansha platform for shojo manga), but also is on Magazine Pocket (Kodansha platform for shonen manga.)*

[Alternate official raw](https://palcy.kodansha.co.jp/c/1.html)

title: Reality Quest
summary:
Ha Do-wan is a bullied gamer, whose bullies force him to grind to obtain in-game items for them. 

After one such bully demands that Dowan obtain an impossibly rare item for him or be beaten in front of the prettiest girl in school, Dowan games day and night for a week until he drops dead from exhaustion. 

However, as soon as he dies, he respawns back in his classroom one week before his death. Everything is the same as it was before, except now he has all the skills he’s acquired from the games he’s played in real life! 

Will Dowan be able to use his newfound abilities and gamified existence to defeat his bullies?

title: Random Target
summary: Choi Serin is struggling with finding her perfect ideal man. She became a fool after failing her first love and was dumped by her very handsome ex boyfriend a week before her birthday. In the end, she tried to find a man that’s like a ‘unicorn’ in the legends… But one day, she really met a unicorn in a VR blind date app <Random Target>! So, who is Choi Serin’s true love?

title: Doctor Resignation
summary: When the duke, who was in poor condition, suddenly died, the land fell into the hands of the rebels. In a short time, the rebellion was suppressed by the royal family, but… The point is that I, Lise Estelle, will be hanged for treason. “It’s not fair!” I’m simply the best doctor in the area. If that’s the case, I’ll become the duke’s doctor this time so there’s no rebellion, and I’ll make the duke’s heir healthy! “No one cares about you as much as I do. Therefore, you must definitely listen to me !

title: I Tamed the Enemy Prince
summary: After losing his life in an accident, Kazuma finds himself reincarnated as the Ascalon Empire's third prince, Ares.  He wasn't born with the "stigmata", the proof that one is royalty and gives them extraordinary abilities, however, he still received love from his family and spent his days in peace. Until one day, his father's first wife, Germa barged into their home, and looked at Ares in contempt for not having a stigmata. In the end, she even put his mother, Erina in danger. Realizing how powerless he truly was, Ares decided to protect his family with his own power. He decides to enroll into Ascalon Academy, a prestigious school where one's capability decides everything!

title: High Society
summary:
**"Please sell me. I will become the most expensive lady in Sant'nar"**

Tired of the troubles brought about by his political marriage, debauchee Cesare coincidentally enters into an unusual  contract Adel, a shoeshiner from the slums.

The deadline is three months.

Expecting this to be his liberation from the tedious strategic marriage, Cesare finds himself becoming increasingly concerned about Adel, who behaves unlike any woman he has ever known...

"In the first place, didn't you bring me here to get me engaged to Sir Ezra?"
"That's right."

Cesare replied obediently for a moment before bursting into a sharp laugh.

"But why do I feel so disgusted?"
